TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey extends System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey

Docs.summary: Specifies an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) public key for use with the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey objects are used in key exchanges with <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng> objects.

Docs.summary: Gets the key BLOB format for a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"> object.
Docs.value: The format that the key BLOB is expressed in.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters ExportExplicitParameters() cil managed

Docs.summary: Exports the key and explicit curve parameters used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve"> object into an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters> object.
Docs.returns: The key and explicit curve parameters used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve"> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters ExportParameters() cil managed

Docs.summary: Exports the key used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve"> object into an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters> object.
Docs.returns: The key and named curve parameters used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve"> object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the key was created as a named curve, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Curve?displayProperty=fullName> field contains named curve parameters; otherwise, it contains explicit parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey FromByteArray(unsigned int8[] publicKeyBlob, class System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat format) cil managed

Docs.param: A byte array that contains an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) public key.
An object that specifies the format of the key BLOB.
Docs.summary: Converts a byte array that contains a public key to a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"> object according to the specified format.
Docs.returns: An object that contains the ECDH public key that is serialized in the byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This static method is shared among all <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> instances.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey FromXmlString(string xml) cil managed

Docs.param: An XML string that contains an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) key.
Docs.summary: Converts an XML string to an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"> object.
Docs.returns: An object that contains the ECDH public key that is specified by the given XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This static method is shared among all <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> instances.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey Import() cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"> object to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object.
Docs.returns: An object that contains the key represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToXmlString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Serializes the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"> public key to an XML string in RFC 4050 format.
Docs.returns: An XML string that contains the serialized <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"> public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks See <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat?displayProperty=fullName>for information about the XML format that this method uses.
